body_html:
Hi,
Is there a work around for working with sparse tensor when batch_size>1? The version I work with is 0.3.1.
The error I get is:
AttributeError: 'torch.sparse.FloatTensor' object has no attribute 'unsqueeze'
Thank you,
Ortal

body:
Hi,
Is there a work around for working with sparse tensor when batch_size>1? The version I work with is 0.3.1.
The error I get is:
AttributeError: 'torch.sparse.FloatTensor' object has no attribute 'unsqueeze'
Thank you,
Ortal
